short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text Selection Search allows the quick search on Youtube, Facebook, Bing, Vimeo Videos and Duckduckgo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Selection Search allows the quick search on various famous platforms.

You can search for text you have highlighted or selected. When some text is selected you can left click the selected text to get a popup where you can select the following options:

1. Youtube
2. Vimeo
3. Bing
4. Facebook
5. Google
6. Duckduckgo

You can send us the request to add more options in Text Selection Search tool at
anythingsearch48@gmail.com
